What to Do

Use PHP session management, instead of writing your own.

Why

The framework works on a lower level than the application and is therefore better suited to provide session management. PHP offers mature and simple to use session management functionality.

How

Please, refer to the link to the PHP manual below for thorough documentation of PHP session management functionality.

Additional Resources

  • For information about PHP session management, see http://www.php.net/manual/en/book.session.php
